attr.title: Freesynd
attr.desc: Syndicate is a beloved classic DOS action / strategy game where you play a hit man for one of a handful of global corporations (syndicates) that have taken over the world. Reminiscent of the look of the X-Com games but in real-time, you move your squad of characters through the missions, earning money by successfully completing them to upgrade your team for the next mission.
attr.inst:
Copy all files from the original Syndicate "DATA" directory
into the FreeSynd "data" directory

Attention: Please, be sure to have files from the first version of
Syndicate as FreeSynd does not support files from Syndicate Plus or Syndicate
Wars.
